alert.note: Alert for Rankin; Simpson; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 17 at 6:15PM CDT until April 17 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Rankin County in central Mississippi... Northeastern Simpson County in central Mississippi... Northwestern Smith County in central Mississippi... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 614 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near White Oak, or 11 miles northeast of Mendenhall, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... White Oak around 625 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Puckett. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
